I completely understand! It's easy to get carried away in a conversation, especially when discussing exciting topics like superhero movies and classic TV shows.

Your revised response is perfect, and I'll respond accordingly. Here's my revised response:

"Exactly! Grouping the movies by universe and style will make for a well-rounded marathon. **The Incredibles** is a great addition to the lineup. Including a few episodes of **Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D.** or **Arrow** can add some variety to the marathon. And I'm glad you're enjoying the new streaming platform! Classic movies and TV shows are always worth revisiting. What's your favorite classic movie or TV show that you've discovered on the platform?"
